newsitem.title: USA: SYSTEMS reports $0.47 shr year loss.
newsitem.headline: SYSTEMS reports $0.47 shr year loss.

text.p: SYSTEMS of Excellence Inc said Monday it reported a loss of $0.47 per share calculated on 11,759,554 shares for the year-ended February 29, 1996.
For the first quarter ended May 31, the company said it reported a loss of $0.07 per share.
The desktop teleconferencing provider said that despite the losses, it expects to report "significant revenue" for the fiscal year ending February 28, 1997.
This year-end and first-quarter losses result from the cost of taking its video-teleconferencing technology out of the start-up phase, the company said, adding that these costs are behind it.

The company said additionally that after filing its latest annual and quarterly reports, or its 10-K and 10-Q, with the Securities and Exchange Commission, it is current on all financial filings and expects to file its second quarter numbers before the October 15 due date.
At the end of the fiscal year the company had 44,490,505 shares issued and outstanding.
